segments.text: I notice the detailed line drawing of this kitchen mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full, water spilling over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, no plug in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, eyes down, foot in puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her dress and apron, so domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy perches on the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's fishing cookies out of the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate in his other hand, maybe to hide evidence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, arm extended for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation is sweet in this sneaky moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the tilting stool worries me greatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streams down the cabinets, ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a calm garden, birds maybe flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This interior chaos feels so unnecessary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns soon and saves the day.
segments.speaker: PAR
